short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DEPRECATED (no longer supported) -- Positive Sum Networks is shutting down. Watch for new Whosum projects at whosum.com.
*******************************************************************

BETA TESTING for Whosum Social Assistant.

Make a searchable local copy of your Twitter data. Auto-discover which follows are on Mastodon and other networks, record content, and subscribe to updates for much more coming soon!

** NEW ** Record tweets and videos, categorize and rate them, and back them up to a personal cloud location.

Installation and demo video at whosum.com
